document.full_text: kohlberg kravis roberts has agreed to pay $159 million for a 10 percent stake in the masan consumer corporation, a food company, in the largest private equity transaction ever in vietnam.
document.title: k.k.r. takes stake in vietnamese consumer company
lines_and_colors: kohlberg kravis roberts has agreed to pay $159 million for a 10 percent stake in the masan consumer corporation, a food company, in the largest private equity transaction ever in vietnam.
